name: Placement
description: Numerical value indicating score on the placement test for each learner (0-100)

name: Characters
description: Mean number of characters per word in the text sample

name: Syllables
description: Mean number of syllables per word in the text sample

name: Morphemes
description: Mean number of morphemes per word in the text sample

name: Frequency
description: Mean frequency of occurrence per word in the text sample
